description: FlatBuffers is an efficient cross platform serialization library for C++, C#, C, Go, Java, JavaScript, Lobster, Lua, TypeScript, PHP, and Python. It was originally created at Google for game development and other performance-critical applications.
summary: FlatBuffers is an efficient cross platform serialization library for C++, C#, C, Go, Java, JavaScript, Lobster, Lua, TypeScript, PHP, and Python. It was originally created at Google for game development and other performance-critical applications.
author: Wouter van Oortmerssen
